benchmark_details.name: Qualcomm Interactive Video Dataset (IVD)
benchmark_details.overview: The Qualcomm Interactive Video Dataset (IVD) allows for assessing the performance of models in real-time question-answering setups using audio-visual input, presenting unique challenges for situated visual reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To train and evaluate AI models on situated visual understanding based on real-time interactions.

data.source: Videos recorded by crowd workers using mobile devices or laptops.
data.annotation: Manual transcription of questions and answers with timestamp annotations.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the correctness of answers evaluated by a language model judge.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in correctly answering questions.
methodology.validation: Evaluation involves measuring model correctness against ground-truth answers.
